XI.ii.3.E.2.b
.
Exceptions to the Limitation on Retroactive Periods
When accrued benefits are payable to the survivors or estate of a
Nehmer
class member under
38 CFR 3.816(f)
, there is no limitation in the retroactive period, regardless of the date of death.
Note
:  Follow the Nehmer guidance in
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 2.C.1.a-e
when making the accrued claim decision for eligibility and payment.
Reference
:  For more information on accrued benefits under
Nehmer
, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 2.B
.
